Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board extends Object
Board class for Scrabble game is a 15x15 game board. It handles tile placement, position, validation, and also baord management

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructor initializing the empty 15x15 board.

  • Method Details

    • validPosition

      public boolean validPosition(int row, int col)
      Checks if a postion is valid for tile placement. it checks if position is available
      Parameters:
      row - the row index from 0 to 14
      col - the column index from 0 to 14
      Returns:
      true if position is valid and available, false if not.

    • getPosition

      public Tile getPosition(int row, int col)
      Gets the tile at a specific positon.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index from 0 to 14
      col - the column index from 0 to 14
      Returns:
      the Tile at position, or null if empty or invalid position

    • placeTile

      public boolean placeTile(int x, int y, Tile tile)
      Places one tile at a precise position. It is used by ScrabbleGame when we place an individual tile
      Parameters:
      x - the row position from 0 to 14
      y - the column position from 0 to 14
      tile - the tile to place
      Returns:
      true if the placement was a success, false if otherwise

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int x, int y)
      Gets the tile at a specific position. It is used by ScrabbleGame
      Parameters:
      x - the row position from 0 to 14
      y - the column position from 0 to 14
      Returns:
      the tile at the position or null if it is empty

    • placeTiles

      public boolean placeTiles(String rowLabel, int col, String direction, String word, Player player)
      Places the tiles on the board for a word. This is the main way to place words when playing
      Parameters:
      rowLabel - row letter from A to O
      col - column number from 1 to 15
      direction - either ACROSS or DOWN
      word - the word to place
      player - the player placing the word
      Returns:
      true if words fits within bounds

    • isWordInBounds

      private boolean isWordInBounds(int row, int col, String direction, String word)
      Checks if word placement is within the bounds of the board.
      Parameters:
      row - starting row
      col - starting column
      direction - "ACROSS" or "DOWN"
      word - the word to place
      Returns:
      true if word fits within the bounds

    • coversCenter

      private boolean coversCenter(int row, int col, String direction, String word)
      Checks if word covers the center square for the first word.
      Parameters:
      row - starting row
      col - starting column
      direction - is either ACROSS or DOWN
      word - the word
      Returns:
      true if word covers the center square and false if not

    • canPlaceTiles

      private boolean canPlaceTiles(int row, int col, String direction, String word)
      Checks if tiles can be put without placing over different tiles. Allows to reuse existing tiles it they are the same.
      Parameters:
      row - starting row
      col - starting column
      direction - either ACROSS or DOWN
      word - the word to place
      Returns:
      true if tiles can be placed

    • wordConnects

      private boolean wordConnects(int row, int col, String direction, String word)
      Checks if word connects to current tiles on board. It is mandatory for all words after the first word.
      Parameters:
      row - starting row
      col - starting column
      direction - either ACROSS or DOWN
      word - the word
      Returns:
      true if the word connects to current tiles

    • hasNeighbourTile

      private boolean hasNeighbourTile(int row, int col)
      Checks if a position has a neighbour tile.
      Parameters:
      row - the row
      col - the column
      Returns:
      true if any neighbouring position has a tile

    • playerHasTiles

      private boolean playerHasTiles(Player player, int row, int col, String direction, String word)
      Checks if player has all tiles needed for the word.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      row - the starting row
      col - the starting column
      direction - either ACROSS or DOWN
      word - the word
      Returns:
      true if player has the required tiles

    • performPlacement

      private void performPlacement(Player player, int row, int col, String direction, String word)
      Actually places the tiles on the board. It also removes the tiles from the player's hand and places them on board.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      row - the starting row
      col - the staarting column
      direction - either ACROSS or DOWN
      word - the word

    • clearBoard

      public boolean clearBoard()
      Clears the entire board Used for Test purposes in BoardTest
      Returns:
      true if the board has cleared succesfully

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the board is empty Used for Test purposes in BoardTest
      Returns:
      true if no tiles are on the board and false if otherwise

    • getWordsAtPosition

      public void getWordsAtPosition(int row, int col)
      Gets all words at a precised position. Used for Test purposes in BoardTest

    • getHorizontalWord

      private String getHorizontalWord(int row, int col)
      gets a horizontal word at a precised position

    • getVerticalWord

      private String getVerticalWord(int row, int col)
      gets a vertical word at a precised position

    • getBoardSize

      public int getBoardSize()
      Gets the board size. Used for Test purposes in BoardTest
      Returns:
      the size of the board

    • isFirstWordPlaced

      public boolean isFirstWordPlaced()
      Checks if the first word has been placed Used for Test purposes in BoardTest
      Returns:
      true if the first word was placed, false if not
